snippet.title: The Tape - Release Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
"The Tape" is a psychological puzzle horror game set in an old Eastern European hotel. Watch VHS tapes to get accounted with the story and escape before it's to late.

Play the game here for free: https://aleksamanja.itch.io/the-tape



First person horror game, made in unity game engine. Found footage horror game where you watch tapes to progress. Experimental horror game on itch. Indie horror game made with HFPS kit. Itch.io game. Indie horror game trailer. Itch horror game. Psychological horror game, horror puzzle game. Alex X. VHS horror game. Free horror game. Indie game.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlexX_GameDev

Srpska horror igra, balkanska horror igra.
